Reviews.Title: “Average hostel”

Reviews.Content: rate agua average paid deal spacious basically furnished clean whatsoever uncomfortable beds location sagrada familia 20minute walk placa catalunya 12 minutes foot neighbouring streets tapas restaurants pubs

Reviews.Title: “good value”
Reviews.Author: FabioV76
Reviews.Content: frills dont expect 5 stars hotel hostal clean expected essential personal friendly helpful credit card loaded complete days receipt sun terrace reccomend

Reviews.Title: “Very good value”
Reviews.Author: leroy186
Reviews.Content: location city center sightseeings nearby shared bathroom clean cosy staff helpful english spoken dont clean day else ok price paid 50 euros night bask

Reviews.Title: “Good Price, Good Location, Friendly Staff, Limited Services.”
Reviews.Author: MelbTrav
Reviews.Content: feel spain hotel colour schemes shared lounge level view courtyards hotel normal hotel limited services laundry service complicated hours contact staff luggage nice foyer nice little courtyard staff friendly willing help speak english recommended

Reviews.Title: “Great stay at Agua Alegre”
Reviews.Author: Jenniferocious
Reviews.Content: found hotel charming staff guests peaceful unlike reviews found bed comfortable lot walking everyday probably found marble floor comfy agree definitely spain paid £35 night double shared bathroom clean shower location excellent 5 minute walk la ramblas barcelona tip don’t bother top barcelona tour bus day pass tube cheaper €5 quieter don’t feel rushed move constantly sagrada familia takes 23 hours day

HotelInfo.Name: Agua Alegre
HotelInfo.Address: c/ Roger de Lluria, 47, 08009 Barcelona, Spain
